nodes.description: MUIS及新加坡穆斯林社区谴责斯里兰卡复活节爆炸袭击中的无辜伤亡
nodes.support_text: MUIS and the Singapore Muslim community strongly condemn the killing of innocent lives in the bombings in Sri Lanka on Easter Sunday today.

nodes.description: 对袭击宗教场所及和平信徒的暴行表示深表痛心与哀悼
nodes.support_text: We are deeply saddened to see another act of terror on places of worship and on peaceful worshippers.

nodes.description: 重申伊斯兰教倡导宗教和谐、尊重信仰场所及保护生命价值观
nodes.support_text: Islam is a religion that calls for peace and harmonious relations between communities of different faiths.

nodes.description: 向斯里兰卡人民致以慰问与祈祷，表达共同面对困难的立场
nodes.support_text: Our thoughts and prayers are with the people of Sri Lanka in these difficult and trying times.
